<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>

Got the LEDs and the brains working in the [Untztrument trellis midi kit](https://learn.adafruit.com/untztrument-trellis-midi-instrument) I from Adafruit and started in [day 4](/day-4-untztrument-trellis-midi-kit). It works! This thing is a lot of fun to play with.
